name: WeightDoc
overview:
WeightDoc is an innovative online-based coaching for overweight children and teenagers all over the world.

With more than 50 years of clinical pediatric experience in our WeightDoc team, we can help your child to loose weight in a safe and sustainable manner. Our weight loss program puts a high emphasis on the physical as well as the psychological well being of your child.

Psychological well being includes your child’s very personal challenges as well as its social and school life. Physical well being is about your child feeling healthy and happy in it’s own body. In all required areas, we focus on making step-by-step adjustments. We strongly believe that only gradual changes can have a long-term effect. Our weight loss method has been scientifically tested and evaluated over a period of more than 25 years at the Medical University of Graz, Austria.
